com.syntax.ui

Class AbstractSyntaxCaret

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.geom.RectangularShape
      • java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D
        • java.awt.Rectangle
          • javax.swing.text.DefaultCaret
            • com.syntax.ui.AbstractSyntaxCaret
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.FocusListener, java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.awt.Shape, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.EventListener, javax.swing.text.Caret
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DefaultSyntaxCaret

    public abstract class AbstractSyntaxCaret
extends javax.swing.text.DefaultCaret
    If setSyntaxFont(java.awt.Font) is called, it automatically call setCaretHeight(int), the only abstract method in this class. Implement setCaretHeight(int) to support showing sutiable Caret on the SyntaxTextArea
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
